patient_info: Bilateral ptosis,EMG: decremental response of compound muscle action potential to repetitive nerve stimulation,Fatigable weakness,Upper limb muscle weakness,Difficulty climbing stairs,Difficulty standing,EMG: repetitive nerve stimulation abnormality,Favorable response of weakness to acetylcholine esterase inhibitors,Abnormal levator palpebrae superioris morphology
golden_diagnosis: 全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis,全身型重症肌无力/Generalized myasthenia gravis; GMG/Myasthenia gravis/Myasthenia gravis
predict_diagnosis:
1. Myasthenia gravis
2. Progressive muscular atrophy (PMA)
3. Inflammatory myopathy (e.g., polymyositis, dermatomyositis)
4. Neuromyotonia (also known as Isolated myonuralgic cramp, IMC)
5. Lambert-Eaton myasthenic syndrome (LEMS)
6. Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP)
7. Autoimmune neuropathy (e.g., Guillain-Barré syndrome, chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy)
8. Fabry disease
9. Pompe disease
10. Metabolic myopathy (e.g., McArdle disease, Danon disease)

Please provide a detailed explanation for each diagnosis, including the underlying pathophysiology, clinical features, and any supporting diagnostic tests or biomarkers.
